name: Tormans
description: Tormans is an open world, tactical RPG in a post-technology setting. You can do anything, go everywhere and become adventurer, rogue, traveler through the ruins of an ancient unknown world. Get followers, loot dead enemies, and do your best to write own history in this harsh realm and understand what happened here. Size of World about 1220 km, many locations and danger places await you.
